text: Rajendra Arlekar (born 23 April 1954) is an Indian politician. He is 21st Governor of Himachal Pradesh since 2021. He was a Cabinet Minister in the Government of Goa. He was a speaker of the Goa Legislative Assembly. He is a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Himachal Pradesh
title: Rajendra Arlekar
